text: Hey Bob, are you coming to the meeting today?
Hi! Yes, Robert here. I'll be there at 10am.
Perfect! Also, can you check with Liz about the design mockups?
Sure thing! I'll ping Elizabeth right after our meeting. BTW, Mike Chen said he'd join us too.
Hey guys, it's Lizzie. Just saw your message Bobby! The mockups are ready for review.
Awesome, thanks Beth! Mike, are you there?
Professor Chen here! Sorry, running a bit late from my lecture. Be there in 5.
@alex_rodriguez just messaged - she wants to join the design review too
Hi team! This is Alexandra. Looking forward to seeing what you've all been working on.
Welcome Alex! We've made great progress. Rob and I worked on it all weekend.
Thanks Liz! I appreciate the dedication. Bill Anderson from legal will need to review it too.
William here - just caught up on the thread. Happy to review from a legal perspective.

Great to have you on board, Will! 

- Mike

Alright team, let's wrap this up. Thanks everyone!

Best,
Rob
